attributes.action: send any muslim who disagree's with the goverment straight back home.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: sign this petition if you are sick of muslims. protesting and shouting at our countrys armed forces. If we stood outside a mosk and harrassed them we would be locked up and the key thrown away. if they dont want to live by the laws of this country they can leave.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
